name: OR_LOG_PANEL_TIME2
description: The OR_LOG_PANEL_TIME2 table contains OR management system log panel timing information for the second panel.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log the panel time refers to.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the panel time in the surgical log.

columns.name: PANEL_TIME_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description: The event set up to take place in a panel in the surgical log.

columns.name: PANEL_START_TIME
columns.description: The date and time the event began in the surgical log.

columns.name: PANEL_END_TIME
columns.description: The date and time the event ended in the surgical log.

columns.name: PANEL_EVENT_ELPSD
columns.description: Indicates the total amount of time for the event in the surgical log.

columns.name: PANEL_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical procedure, if this event is associated with a particular procedure.

columns.name: PANEL_PROC_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: PANEL_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description: The panel level event. This line will be blank when a procedure level event was documented.

columns.name: PROCEDURE_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description: The procedure level event. This line will be blank when a panel level event was documented.

columns.name: INST_PNL2_INTER_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Instant of update for an event in panel 2. This will be used for Event Interval functionality.
